intro:
Push your favourite to the very top!
A must for hololive fans!
A fun and easy 3D action game — just keep pushing!
description:
Roll the adorable hololive members—your little “treasures”—and push them all the way to the finish!

How to Play:
Just roll or toss your treasures (hololive talents) to move ahead!
Combine identical treasures to create new ones!
Merge and roll your way to the very top!

Multiplayer:
Team up online with up to four players to reach the goal!
Or challenge a friend locally to see who can finish a stage the fastest.

Stages:
Take on 36 unique stages, including special areas themed after Secret Society holoX and hololive DEV_IS!
Compete to be the fastest climber worldwide!

Play Your Way:
Earn stars in stages to freely swap treasures in your “Treasure Collection.”
Collect and customise your treasures, and help your favourite reach the summit!

Unlockable Characters:
Collect coins to unlock cute mascots and play as them!
Save up coins and trade for your favourite characters!

Linked Bonus — “Kumarine”:
If you play on a system with hololive Treasure Mountain MegaPack for Nintendo Switch™, you’ll unlock the exclusive character “Kumarine”!
